articles.title: Europe Could See "Another Half A Million Covid Deaths" By February: WHO - NDTV
articles.description: The rising number of cases of Covid-19 in Europe is of "grave concern" and the region could see another half a million deaths by early next year, the World Health Organization warned on Thursday.
articles.content:

articles.title: Cycling: Chelsie Tan first S'porean woman to earn pro contract to race in Europe - The Straits Times
articles.description: She will race for Australian outfit Team BikeExchange in the International Cycling Union (UCI) Women's World Tour next year.. Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content:
SINGAPORE - In yet another feather in the cap for local cycling, national road cyclist Chelsie Tan has become the first Singaporean woman to secure a professional contract with a team in Europe.
